newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philex says March sales reach 390 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Philex says March sales reach 390 mln pesos.

text.p: Philex Mining Corp said on Thursday it sold a total of 390 million pesos worth of copper concentrates, gold and silver in March.
The mining company told the Philippine Stock Exchange that it shipped out a total of 10,834 tonnes of copper concentrates from its southern Philippine mines.
It also sold 2,800.52 ounces of gold and 180.11 ounces of silver during the month.
Its subsidiary Philex Gold Philippines Inc, which operates a gold mine in the central Philippines, shipped out 7,620 ounces of gold and 3,830 ounces of silver during the month.
The company did not given comparative figures.
